summary: This Executive Order, dated January 20, 2025, establishes a significant shift in federal policy regarding sex and gender. The order defines sex as a binary, biological classification (male/female) and explicitly rejects the concept of gender identity in federal policy. It requires all federal agencies to use sex-based (not gender-based) language in their policies and documents, prohibits federal funding for 'gender ideology,' and mandates that federal identification documents reflect biological sex. The order also addresses single-sex spaces, requiring that facilities like prisons and domestic violence shelters be segregated by biological sex rather than gender identity. It directs the Attorney General to issue new guidance on the interpretation of Bostock v. Clayton County and rescinds several Biden-era executive orders and guidance documents related to gender identity protections.
eli5: This is a rule that says the government will only recognize people as either boys/men or girls/women based on how they were born, and won't use different words or rules based on how people feel about their gender. It changes many rules about bathrooms, sports teams, and official papers to only look at biological sex.
